content: search no more for your new favorite fall accessory that makes every outfit the bus stop beret is fast to work up and just lacy enough to be fun pattern available for free on my blog https //crochetaweigh com/free-crochet-patter-bus-stop-beret/ this is written for an adult sized hat this pattern is for an advanced beginner the hat is worked in the round you do not turn your work at all each row is completed with slip stitching to the 1st st
